migration.title: UPS Migration
migration.description: Manage power outage VM migrations and server restart orchestration

destinations.title: Migration Destinations
destinations.yaml_info: This YAML file is automatically generated and will be used by the UPS manager scripts
destinations.vmware_discovery_description: The following ESXi servers are missing VMware Host MOIDs and cannot be used for migration:
destinations.vmware_discovery_action: Please run VMware discovery to detect and register these servers with their MOIDs before configuring migration destinations.

control.title: Migration Control
control.info_migration: Start Migration: Begins the shutdown and migration process according to the configured plan
control.info_restart: Start Restart: Initiates the server and VM restart sequence after power is restored
control.info_cancel: Cancel: Stops the current migration or restart operation
control.confirm_start_message: This will begin the migration process according to the configured plan. VMs will be migrated or shut down, and servers will be powered off. Continue?
control.confirm_restart_message: This will begin restarting servers and VMs in the reverse order of shutdown. Ensure power has been restored. Continue?
control.confirm_cancel_message: Are you sure you want to cancel the current operation? This may leave the system in an intermediate state.
control.confirm_clear_message: This will clear all current migration data. Are you sure?

status.title: Migration Events
status.confirm_clear_message: This will permanently delete all migration event history. Are you sure?

preview.title: Migration Preview
preview.info: This is a preview of the migration that will be performed.

resource-usage.name: Resource Usage

setup.title: Getting Started with Upstra
setup.welcome_desc: Congratulations, you are the first administrator of this installation. We will configure your infrastructure step by step!
setup.step_rooms_desc: Define your physical spaces and their capacity
setup.step_ups_desc: Manage power protection for your equipment
setup.step_servers_desc: Monitor your vCenter and ESXi servers
setup.info_additional: You will be able to change these settings later.

restart.title: Restart Setup
restart.description: Are you sure you want to restart the setup process? This will erase all your current progress and data.

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: All rooms, servers, UPS devices, and configuration data will be permanently deleted.

setup.skip_confirm: Are you sure you want to skip guided setup?
setup.next_step_aria: Go to next step: create a server room
setup.feature_rooms_desc: Create and manage your server rooms, data centers, and physical locations for optimal organization.
setup.feature_servers_desc: Monitor and control your vCenter and ESXi servers with real-time status updates and SSH access.
setup.feature_ups_desc: Ensure continuous operation with UPS monitoring, battery status tracking, and automated shutdown procedures.
setup.feature_security_desc: Protect your infrastructure with role-based access control, two-factor authentication, and audit logging.
setup.read_only_message: This step is completed. You cannot modify these settings.

review.title: Review Your Configuration
review.description: Check all your resources before applying the configuration
review.info_message: Once applied, your infrastructure will be created and you can start monitoring it immediately.
review.vmware_detected_message: VMware servers have been detected in your configuration. You can enable automatic virtual machine discovery after creation.
review.validation_errors_message: Please correct the following errors before continuing:

review.validation_warning_on_load: Configuration validation detected issues. Please review and correct any errors before proceeding.
review.reset_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the entire configuration? This will delete all rooms, UPS devices, and servers.
